sample_docs: Digitize the onboarding process of your client to improve customer experience and to ensure the highest level of trust. PSD2 rewrites the rules of security Certify identity of incumbents and emerging players, guarantee the data's authenticity in the transaction and impose Strong Customer Authentication solutions for the customers InfoCert is the largest Certification Authority in Europe. We enable companies to innovate the customer interactions and operational processes leveraging our portfolio of trust-based business solutions and services. Our Solutions increase operational efficiency, enable digital customer interactions with full legal value, enhance security and governance of business operations. The first foundation platform in the RegTech market. A full set of eIDAS compliant integrated services to deliver end-to-end digital trust solutions. Digital Trust Foundation Platform THE TOTAL ECONOMIC IMPACT™ OF INFOCERT TOP THE TOTAL ECONOMIC IMPACT™ OF INFOCERT GOSIGN THE TOTAL ECONOMIC IMPACT™ OF TOP FOR INSTANT LENDING We operate in 11 Countries worldwide and we serve more than 1.5 million customers and 500 enterprises that rely on our capabilities to digitalize their businesses. We invest annually in Research & Development an average of 6% of our turnover. We work closely with major European Universities and Research Centers. We are the Certification Authority with the largest number of patents in the trust space. To mantain the status of Qualified Trust Service Provider, InfoCert is continuously audited and controlled. Our Certifications flag our commitment and investment in providing the highest service quality to our customers. eIDAS Qualified Trust Service Provider eIDAS Qualified Time Stamps ETSI EN 319 401 Adobe Approved Trust List Member (AATL) Quality Management System ISO 90012008 Information Security Management System ISO 270012013 Service Management System ISO 200002011

Discover all reports Our DNA Much more than a Qualified Digital Trust Services Provider Digital trust We certify the identity of parties involved in digital transactions to secure your processes. We provide a complete portfolio of digital trust solutions to ensure the compliance of your operations. Compliance We develop compliance by de novative solutions to effectively address customers needs from different industries and countries ESG We support customers in pursuing their Environmental, Sustainability and Governance objectives analysing the impact of our digital Trust solutions Cyber Security We provide customers the most complete and safest range of solutions guaranteeing a security de iure, with digital trust solutions, de facto, integrating Cyber Security. Focus on your business needs, we do the rest Rely on our Digital Trust and Compliance expertise to innovate and secure you processes ONE STOP SHOP From Digital Trust to Cyber Security, InfoCert offers all the kind of services you need to secure your digital transactions. WE'LL HANDLE COMPLIANCE FOR YOU Thanks to our team dedicated to studying local and international regulations, we ensure compliant solutions in every country and sector.
